name: Spell Projection as Strike
effect: The Base Value of your offensive [@skill Spell Projection @] is the same as your Base [@skill Strike @] Value.

name: Spell Projection as Block or Dodge
effect: The Base Value of your defensive [@skill Spell Projection @] is the same as your Base [@skill Block @] or [@skill Dodge @] Value.

name: Spell Projection as Phenom Projection
effect: The Base Value of [@skill Spell Projection @] is the same as your Base [@skill Phenom Projection @] Value.
